description: To use former bank as a restaurant (Use Class A3) opening between 0700 and 23.30 hours Mon-Sat, and 0800 and 2300 hours on Sundays, with associated external dining area at the rear opening between 0700 and 22.30 hours Mon-Sat, and 0800 and 2200 hours on Sundays, use part of first floor as associated storage/staff welfare, erect extraction flue to rear, remove external staircase at rear, erect decorative screen at rear, erect single storey extension at rear, paint all walls dark grey and carry out other minor external alterations
site_address: Former HSBC Bank, 1 Woolton Street & 3 Allerton Road, Liverpool, L25 7RB
